dimensions:
H x W x D (cup on saucer): 4.6 x 10 x 10 cm (1 13/16 x 3 15/16 x 3 15/16 in.)
H x W x D (cup): 4 x 8 x 6 cm (1 9/16 x 3 1/8 x 2 3/8 in.)
W x L (saucer): 10 x 10 cm (3 15/16 x 3 15/16 in.)
title: Cup and saucer
medium: Glazed porcelain with painting and gilding
description: Four-lobed curved demitasse, with double ring handle, and four-lobed saucer. Outisde of cup and inside of saucer decorated with wide gold band with green dots in high reflief, on pink ground. Inside of cup and the handle gilt.
name: Cup and saucer
